summary:
Specialties:
- Cloud Transitions (AWS, Azure, Red Hat OpenStack/OpenShift)
- Operations and Service Management (ITIL, ServiceNow)
- Architecture Development (TOGAF, ArchiMate, BOC Group ADOIT)
- CI/CD (GitLab, Jenkins, Azure DevOps)
- DC Network Automation (Cisco ACI/MSO, Ansible)
- Cloud Infrastructure and Application Automation (Terraform, ARM, CFT, Ansible, Puppet, Helm)
- Robotics Process Automation (BluePrism, UiPath)
- Program and Project Management (PRINCE2)

AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert 
Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert: Cloud Platform & Infrastructure
Red Hat OpenStack/OpenShift, CCNA, TOGAF9, PRINCE2, ITILv3, and COBIT5 certified
Accenture Certified Senior Technology Architect

Executive Education Program Certificate from Saïd Business School, University of Oxford (UK)
Masters in Computer Engineering from Khazar University (Azerbaijan)

EU Long Term Resident in Latvia.
Worked in multiple projects across EU (Germany, France, Nordics)

Delivered various projects with a focus on automation management of network infrastructure, infrastructure transitions/migrations, penetration/vulnerability tests.', 'title': 'Senior Technology Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 35505428, 'name': 'NEQSOL HOLDING', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFONi6mQPH7ww/company-logo_400_400/0/1561098719960?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=YXK1z3OzvQ1jy2NivIbwHynpt2PY4hIVYOQ-gJMK5As', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/neqsol-holding/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'NEQSOL HOLDING', 'description': 'Previous name: Capital Resources Advisors (Group of Companies)

Group includes LTE/UMTS mobile network operators (Bakcell and Azerfon), a shared radio access network operator (Azerconnect), a country-wide Internet wholesale operator (AzerTelecom), FTTH Internet retail operator (CityNet), a cement production company (Norm) and EPCI holding (Nobel Energy).

Role:
- Group-level director responsible for close interactions with Group senior IT & Information Security (IS) personnel in all companies to implement Group-wide policies and procedures.
- Group-level IT and IS projects coordination.
- Chair of the Group-level EIT Committee.
- Adviser to the Shareholder and Boards regarding new technology opportunities and business transformation.

Achievements:
- Designed COBIT/ITIL/ISO-compliant Group-level enterprise IT technology guidelines.
- Acted as liaison between Bakcell and Azerfon during launch of Azerconnect. Project did include enterprise IT and ERP systems setup.
- Supervised B/OSS projects design and implementation at Azerconnect.
- Established and managed IS teams within Bakcell and Azerfon and setup centralized IS reporting up to the Group CISO.
- Initiated, secured board commitment, and orchestrated a DDoS mitigation solution. Project scope covered all Group Companies, potential external customers and turned into a new revenue stream for AzerTelecom.
- Managed data center consolidation and ERP system implementation project at Nobel Energy. Project brought holding with automated financial operations, end-to-end procurement and logistics, and improved corporate governance.
- Provided valuable support to Norm on its business continuity planning, disaster recovery site expansion and SCADA system design.
- Initiated, secured board commitment, and orchestrated a unified communications solution for the Group Companies. Project improved Group-inside decision making processes.', 'title': 'Group IT Director', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 10819883, 'name': 'Nobel Energy', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHj0vr94dvHjw/company-logo_400_400/0/1638362220956?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=RpMDUG8QxUUjPXqzj1JtMIIwY4WnyYhLSzgDBxlFUm4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nobel-energy/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Nobel Energy', 'description': 'Achievements:
- Managed all IT Operations for 7 business units across the country.
- Supervised team of IT professionals with annual operating budget of USD 4,000k for customer base of 500+ employees.
- Built an enterprise LAN/WAN infrastructure including 300+ nodes in the main office, 3 remote onshore and 2 offshore locations
- Built a server infrastructure: Active Directory 2008 forest/domain, Windows Server 2008R2 using Hyper-V and Failover Clustering (2 nodes), ISA 2006 server (persistent VPN site-to-site and users dial-in connections), LAMP stack (RHEL, Apache, MySQL, PHP)
- Performed MTA transition (Postfix > Exchange 2007)
- Managed deployment and post implementation support of enterprise business applications (LOGO Tiger Plus, Infor SunSystems, HRB).
- Designed an internal SOX-compliant enterprise policies and procedures
- Supervised team of network/system and end-user support engineers
- Managed to get 95% of staff requests resolved within 2 business days', 'title': 'ICT Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 546288, 'name': 'Azersun Holding', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGJ8Z3BHZ6TCQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519897400553?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=3VuYsMKqDzucl8KVSER54olWER0B-HkChFEjqD1_EDA', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/azersun-holding/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': 'Azersun Holding', 'description': 'Achievements:

- Performed a wide range of corporate software deployment via SMS for different remote sites
- Trained and supervised team of network/system engineers.', 'title': 'IT Network and Systems Division Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 7601, 'name': 'McDermott Caspian Contractors, Inc', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQErVvM57WXQxw/company-logo_400_400/0/1525994797510?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=BzOgS0Qai8TYecl2ggpR7Tn5EuKukQ02xkv6h1eiaII', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mcdermott-international-inc-/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Azerbaijan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2002}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'McDermott International, Ltd', 'description': 'Projects: AIOC Azeri Chirag Guneshli Pipelines, Central Azeri / Western Azeri / Eastern Azeri Topsides.

- Built a server infrastructure farm including Active Directory 2k3, Exchange 2k3 (clustered platform for a back-end server and placed a front-end server in DMZ), ISA 2004 (placed in DMZ), Citrix MetaFrame XP and Sybase.
